tidbits.title: Mount Kilimanjaro
tidbits.description: Tanzania is home to Mount Kilimanjaro, Africa's highest peak, attracting climbers and offering stunning views from its snow-capped summit.

tidbits.title: Serengeti and Wildlife
tidbits.description: The Serengeti National Park hosts the Great Migration, one of the world's most breathtaking wildlife spectacles, with abundant wildlife like lions, elephants, and wildebeests.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Tanzania's cultural richness is seen in its diverse ethnic groups, each contributing unique traditions, music, dance, and artwork to the country's heritage.
